org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.abc

Class ABCScopeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.abc.visitors.NilABCVisitor
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.abc.ABCScopeBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IABCVisitor, IVisitor

    public class ABCScopeBuilder
extends NilABCVisitor
    Populates symbol table from an ABC file.

    • Field Detail

      • classDefinitions

        protected final Map<ClassInfo,TypeDefinitionBase> classDefinitions

      • path

        protected final String path
        Path of the file that contains the abc data. This field is used to set the containing file path of the definitions built from ABC.

        Create an ABCScopeBuilder from ABC byte code data.
        Parameters:
        workspace - workspace
        abcData - ABC byte code data.
        path - path of the file that contains the abc data.
        fileScopeProvider - callback that creates ASFileScope objects.

      • visitClass

        public IClassVisitor visitClass(InstanceInfo iinfo,
                       ClassInfo cinfo)
        Visit class definition pool. Build a local map from classInfo to ClassDefinition. The pool is queried by children visitors.

        InstanceInfo.Flags

        • ClassSealed=0x01
        • ClassFinal=0x02
        • ClassInterface=0x04
        • ClassProtectedNs=0x08
        Specified by:
        visitClass in interface IABCVisitor
        Overrides:
        visitClass in class NilABCVisitor
        Parameters:
        iinfo - - the class' instance info.
        cinfo - - the class' class info.
        Returns:
        the class' visitor. May be null if the class is not to be processed.
